message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a price that I think is a great value. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $950000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite willing to meet you at $850000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $920000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm still interested in the product, but $920000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $880000. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob, but I still think I can get a bit more out of this deal. I'm willing to meet you at $900000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $900000. I'm willing to go up to $890000. Can you meet me there?
